pullRequest.title: [network] Add support for Wake-on-LAN thing action
pullRequest.bodyText:
Fixes #3799

Adds an optional MAC address to existing devices which can be used to use WoL using Thing actions.

nodes.bodyText: Maybe add a timeout to the test condition, as they do touch code that theoretically make external calls?

When no mac address is configured maybe it would be nice to give a specific error message to the user in case a call is made to the actions method sendWakeOnLanPacket? So state in the IllegalStateException that the macAddress is not configured?
